articles.title: India rejects 'preposterous' Canadian investigation - BBC.com
articles.description: India said its diplomats were named as "persons of interest" in a criminal investigation in Canada.
articles.content:
India is withdrawing its high commissioner to Canada after it said he and other diplomats were named as "persons of interest" in the murder investigation of a Sikh separatist.
India said it received… [+2827 chars]
